message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product, which I believe will be highly valuable to your business.  My asking price is $1400000. This price reflects the significant value and potential of the product.  I'm open to discussing this further and finding a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you've mentioned.

Bob, I understand your perspective and appreciate your interest in the product. While $1200000 is a fair price, it doesn't fully reflect the value and potential I see in this product for your business.  To bridge the gap, I'm willing to offer a slightly reduced price of $1350000. This would still allow you a significant profit margin and allows me to ensure I get a fair return on my investment. I'm confident this is a win-win scenario.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still think $1350000 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1300000. I believe this price reflects the value of the product and would allow us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
